column4: hu me mbɔbɔr; Na wo mu na me kra nya guandɔbew: Nyew
column5: wo ntsaban ase nwinwin mu mibenya mo guandɔbew
column6: Ekodu dɛ mbusu yi botwa mu."

column2: "Mubosu afrɛ ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn; Mebɛfrɛ Nyankopɔn a ɔma dza ɔahyehyɛ ama me no wie pɛyɛ no."

column3: Aber a nyia ɔrepɛ amen me no rehyɛ ahorba no; Nyankopɔn bɔsoma n’adom na no nokwar
column6: Meda hɔn a wɔato hɔn gya mu
column7: Mekyerɛ nyimpa a hɔn se yɛ mpeaa na egyen
column8: Na hɔn tɛkyerɛma yɛ afona ndam ndam no."

column4: Na w’enyimnyam mbɔ asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Woesua m’anamɔn efir; Na me kra abrɛ adze: Woetu mona wɔ m’enyim; Naaso hɔnankasa akɔhwehwe mu."

column4: hom nnyan: Emi mankasa so mibenyan ahema."

column3: mebɛda wo ase wɔ aman mu: Mobɔtow ayɛyindwom ama wo wɔ amanaman mu."
Na wo nokwar kodu wimu noho."
kyerɛ wo kɛseyɛ wɔ sorsor; Ma w’enyimnyam mbɔ asaase nyinara do."
